nodes.documentation: @title A proof of existence contract that stores decoded IPFS path and tags along with a timestamp as immutable records.
nodes.name: ProofOfExistence

nodes.documentation: @dev Sets the caller as the owner of the contract.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Emergency stop. Cant execute this now. Restore from emergency to continue."

@dev Getter function for retrieving all IDs that belongs to given user at once.

nodes.name: getAllIds

nodes.documentation: @dev Stopping function of the Emergency Stop pattern. Disables the timestamp function.
nodes.name: emergencyStop

nodes.documentation: @dev Restoring function of the Emergency Stop pattern. Enables the timestamp function.
